caption.p: HepG2 cells were treated with the indicated concentrations (µg/mL) of test extracts for 48 h and subsequently allowed to grow into colonies for 14 days. After 14 days, the colonies were stained with 0.1% crystal violet and the images of the wells were captured using a digital camera. The colonies were counted using Image J software. Each experiment was performed three times. Asterisks represent significant differences between extract treatments and untreated control, **** p ≤ 0.0001.
